name: Income Tax
description: Every 24h, every citizen is taxed based on their taxable income, which is the difference between their current wealth in Euro and their weath in Euro the last tick subtracting the tax amount of last tickthe taxLastTick is also saved. The citizen pays a tax of 25% of their taxable income between 500€ and 2000€ and 45% of their taxable income above 2000€

properties.Title: Income Tax
properties.UserDescription:
Case 1:the citizen has more than 2000€ taxable income. They get taxed 375€ (25% of their income between 500€ and 2000€) + 45% of their income over 2000€
Case 2:the citizen has less than 2000€ taxable income, but more than 500€ taxable income. They get taxed 25% of their income above 500€
Case 3: the citizen has less than 500€ taxable income. They are not affected by the income tax.
